summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4860 for the improvement of Dearborn Street, from 33rd Avenue South to Lakeside Avenue South; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 55879, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
